resources.string: RECOIL is a viewer of pictures in native formats of Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Apple II, Atari 8-bit, Atari Portfolio, Atari ST, Atari Falcon, BBC Micro, Commodore 16, Commodore 64, Macintosh 128K, MSX, Sam Coup√©, ZX81 and ZX Spectrum computers. RECOIL supports over 200 file formats.

Retro Computer Image Library (C) 2009-2015 Piotr Fusik
Formats research, testing by Mariusz Rozwadowski
RECOIL icon (C) 2014 Pawel Szewczyk
